SELECT d.id AS id, d.dict_code AS dictCode, d.dict_type AS dictType, d.dict_name AS dictName, d.dict_val AS dictVal, d.description AS description, d.create_user AS createUser, d.update_user AS updateUser, DATE_FORMAT(d.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as createTime, DATE_FORMAT(d.update_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as updateTime FROM dictionary d
1=1
and d.dict_code like concat('%',#{dictCode},'%')
and d.dict_type like concat('%',#{dictType},'%')
and d.dict_name like concat('%',#{dictName},'%')
and d.create_user like concat('%',#{createUser},'%')
select from dictionary dictionary where dictionary.dict_code=#{dictCode}
select from dictionary dictionary where dictionary.dict_name=#{dictName}
